get.summary: Get user details by passing the id.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Provide ID to get user details. it will return the object based on the ID

200.description: OK. The request was successful and the response body contains the representation requested

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED. Authentication credentials are required to access the resource. All requests must be authenticated.

403.description: FORBIDDEN. The View Scope applied is invalid, or the authentication credentials are not sufficient to access the resource.

404.description: NOT FOUND. A resource specified in the request could not be located.

415.description: UNSUPPORTED MEDIA TYPE. You did not specify the request Content-Type header to have a value of application/json.

500.description: SERVER ERROR. Updates or actions requested did not succeed. Please try again

parameters.name: Attributes
